rex_promptwrap.name: Prompt wrap
rex_promptwrap.description: Prompt wrap for web and cocoonJS

enable-wrap.name: Enable wrap
enable-wrap.desc: Set No to popup prompt box by browser api.

on-cancell.description: Triggered after opening a text input dialog which is then cancelled.

tag0.name: Tag
tag0.desc: A tag, which can be anything you like, to distinguish between different requests.

on-ok.description: Triggered after opening a text input dialog which is then OK'd.

tag0.name: Tag
tag0.desc: A tag, which can be anything you like, to distinguish between different requests.

prompt.display-text: Prompt text input: title [i]{0}[/i], message [i]{1}[/i], initial text [i]{2}[/i], type [i]{3}[/i], cancel text [i]{4}[/i], OK text [i]{5}[/i] (tag [i]{6}[/i])
prompt.description: Open a dialog where the user can enter some text via the on-screen keyboard.

title0.name: Title
title0.desc: The title to appear on the dialog.

message1.name: Message
message1.desc: A message to appear on the dialog.

initial_text2.name: Initial text
initial_text2.desc: The initial entered text to show on the dialog.

type8.name: Type
type8.desc: The type of text input to use.

tag11.name: Tag
tag11.desc: A tag, which can be anything you like, to distinguish between different requests.

input-text.description: In 'On input OK', get the text entered.
